content:
Website under Construction   -- I am a masters student working with Vishal Garg at Building Science Research Centre at International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad. My primary research interests are in field of Daylighting for improving the thermal and visual comfort as well as applying controls to reduce the energy consumption in buildings.
I am currently working on the projects:
 Development and performance analysis of double pane SemiTransparent Solar Photovoltaic Window/Facade system
summary:

This project aimed at designing a scalable and efficient search engine using 70 GB of Wikipedia data. The search engine outputs the top certain relevant documents based on the search query.
title: Wikipedia Search Engine

summary: The objective of this project is to mine the features of the product on which customers have expressed their opinions. Identified frequent features and opinion words and generated opinion summary.
title: Mining-and-Summarising-Customer-Review

summary: A Mini-SQL engine which will run a subset of SQL queries using command line interface.
title: Mini SQL Engine

summary: The project aimed to predict and identify the major factors affected the movie ratings from the dataset provided. Useful features were extracted from classifying techniques like support vector machine
title: Movie Rating Predictions

summary: The project aimed at developing a webapp in python where users can assign task with resources and deadlines. Features like email reminder and collaboration of multiple people was implemented.
title: Task Management App
